name: Peter Gould
detail: Peter Gould is an American television writer, director and producer. He worked on all five seasons of the AMC drama Breaking Bad. He had been nominated for four Writers Guild of America (WGA) Awards for his work on the series. He is currently working with Breaking Bad creator Vince Gilligan on the show's spinoff, Better Call Saul.

works.name: Better Call Saul (Season 1) / 风骚律师 第一季
Breaking Bad (Season 5) / 绝命毒师 第五季
